u.a: The participants are in the room. Bartosz hides away behind the door.

but what have you done here ?

do you want me to lift you up ?
will you wave your hand from the window ?
come, let's wave from the window .

mother turns around the corner and Bartosz cańt see her any more .

she is not here any more .
father says something . Bartosz says something incomprehensible .
and what have you done with the juice ?
Bartosz talks to his friend through the wall and nobody can understand him .
I want to go to Marta .

father opens the door . Bartosz wants to go down to the yard .
where do you want to go ?
Bartosz and father are back in the room .

more knocking and talking through the wall .

Bartosz takes an apple out of the box .
father tries to persuade Bartosz to put the sandwich back into the bag .
